creator: mangst@inventec.ch
text:
Create a new publication as described in
http://lenya.apache.org/docs/2_0_x/tutorials/newpublication/index.html.
Consider the problems described in bug 43672.
Logging in for authoring you get the "Getting started" page as usual. Choosing
either of the two buttons offered, the following error occurs:
"Exception during commit or rollback:
org.apache.cocoon.components.search.IndexException: message: (see logfiles for
details)"

Creating a new publication via the "Create publication" link on
http://<hostname>/index.html the exception does not occur. I will investigate
further and post my findings.
creator: mangst@inventec.ch
mangst@inventec.ch
text: It was my fault. I made a typo. Sorry for the noise.
